snippet.title: Ship Graveyard Simulator 2 - Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Ship Graveyard Simulator 2 will be available on Steam on August 16, 2023. Watch the trailer to see what to expect with Ship Graveyard Simulator 2, a continuation of the first part of the game, in which the player will take care of destroying and recovering materials from shipwrecks. Ship Graveyard Simulator 2 features new and bigger ships, new gameplay mechanics, features and improvements.

#GameTrailers #Gaming #SimulatorGames
